situation.title: Repair shops and after-sale services
situation.meta_description: Retail sale and the provision of service are not allowed, there are, however, certain exceptions.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendation

In general, retail sale and the provision of service are not allowed, there are, however, certain exceptions which include some repair and service shops.

Car and bicycle services are allowed to be open. Other services allowed to be open are electronics and household appliance services and repairs. Car washes are also allowed to stay open.

Other repairs and services that havent been mentioned in the exceptions have to be closed.

Information on the hygienic rules that have to be followed when visiting a service or repair shop can be found in the Hygiene section.

questions_answers.question: Are tailors open?
questions_answers.value: No, but haberdashery and textile shops are open. We recommend to do a minor repairs by yourself until all service and repair shops will be reopened.

questions_answers.question: Are phone and computer repair shops open?
Can I go to buy a new phone?
questions_answers.value: Electronics shops are closed. The only possibility is to buy a phone online and use the delivery service.

questions_answers.question: Can a repairman come fix my washing machine?
questions_answers.value: Yes, repairs of home appliances are allowed.

questions_answers.question: Can I call a towing service if my car breaks down?
questions_answers.value: Yes, towing services operate without a restriction.
